title: Jumanji
description: The Next Level, the gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to rescue one of their own, the players will have to brave parts unknown from arid deserts to snowy mountains, to escape the world's most dangerous game.

comments.message: This is a great game. I really like it.
comments.author: John Doe

comments.message: This is a bad game. I really dislike it.
comments.author: Pablo Escobar
